author: AP
title: Tokyo Olympic CEO hints games could be in doubt even in 2021
description: Tokyo Olympic CEO hints games could be in doubt even in 2021
content:
TOKYO (AP) — As the coronavirus spreads in Japan, the chief executive of the Tokyo Games said Friday he can’t guarantee the postponed Olympics will be staged next year — even with a 16-month delay.
